snippet: The government on Thursday set new rules to limit evictions of homeowners unable to pay their mortgages, responding to mounting public outrage against banks amid a deepening economic crisis.
abstract: Spanish government sets new rules limiting evictions of homeowners unable to pay their mortgages, in response to mounting public outrage against banks amid deepening economic crisis.
lead_paragraph: The government on Thursday set new rules to limit evictions of homeowners unable to pay their mortgages, responding to mounting public outrage against banks amid a deepening economic crisis.
